popup.title: Auto Youtube Shorts Scroll Down
popup.body1P1: To start using this extension, you need to open the:
popup.body1P2: A switch is created at the top of the video.
popup.body2P1: This extension allows you to automatically scroll down YouTube shorts.
popup.body2P2: Autoplay starts when you turn on the switch.
popup.body2P3: Autoplay is canceled when the switch is turned off.
popup.body2P4: Sometimes I can't create a switch, the solution is to refresh the page.
popup.body2P5: If you come in, please press a star. Thank you.
